name: PixelFem #71 - Patti Smith
description:
Patti Smith is a singer, writer and artist who became a highly influential figure in the New York City punk rock scene. After working on a factory assembly line, she began performing spoken word and later formed the Patti Smith Group (1974-79). Her most famous album is Horses. Her melodramatic music, iconoclastic attitude, sartorial style, and bold and beautiful poetry secured her a place in history as one of the first women in punk—the “punk poet laureate,” as she’s been so aptly nicknamed. She has continued this reputation and attitude to this day, and remains a powerful and inspirational figure.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
